name: Astrognome
description:
You are a dwarf that came to that planet with an extremely important goal.

To accomplish this goal you have to drill through the planet. So defend your Drill-SpaceShip with you 5 abilities (and some cheatcodes).

Thanks to Birdon for music! (Birdon#0903 on Discord)

Thanks to Elthen (https://www.patreon.com/elthen) for his graphics on opengameart!
